resources.string: Do your best , forget the rest
This is a free version , some function and custmosize wii be locked

1.Donate for 15-30 Dollar(~HKD100) you will get fully function and custmosize
2.Donate at least 15 dollar 
3.After donate join the chat room at below :Home-Join chatroom
5.And capture your transformation information ,donation send to chatroom of pm the developer (Press the chat room below)
Flash into your device,make sure your file is suitable with your device
Flash EFS image, If flashing the wrong image ,you will lost IMEI AND CANT NOT BOOT UP!!
Flash TWRP recovery , We cant not ensure your recovery is correct ,Make sure your recovery file is suitable for your devices!
Flash Boot/kernel image,make sure your file is suitable with your device,Flashing incorrect image will cause your phone bootloop or other problem!
Device space is not enough ，please clean up atleast 10GB space！
Disable thermal will increase stablize ,but bring up lotof heat effect
Balance Mod，For daily ising ,balance battery and performance
Gaming(performance) Mod ，may effect heat，you may choose to remove the thermal！
Powersave Mod，For media playing，not very effect but save a lot power！
Speeding Mod，Heat increase，Please remove thermal to ensure stablize！
Timeout，Please make sure your root manager is running，and try again！
Input the height and width for better align of wallpaper !
Click wallpaper to selcet what you want
Not set the wallpaper size ,Using default setup
This function need reboot to apply!
Your device will reboot after all the process is finish
Will be reboot 《 %1$s 》to apply the change

Your DPI can not set as this %1$s

Please set between 330 - 480.

Thank you!
Set current DPI to\n\n Current DPI is %1$s
Hightly recommed to reboot for better experiance ,or skip.
Input character(Can be any emoji or word)
"Launcher downtap（→Mainscreen setting→open notification← ）Invalid,Close it before setup→Click here to open(Mainscreen setting)"
"Double click power,and open→Setting→Advance setup→Quick open camera →Click here to open(Advance menu)"
Mix / empty color base on battery
Full → empty: Red ← Green ← Blue ← Red
Full → empty: Red ← Green ← Blue ← Red

Launcher have been updated please wait
please wait to cat the log
Temperature , size , color show or hide etc
Can not find any app store , want to jump into other app store?

1.Check update
2.Ensure update is puishing 
3.Click download and select your device 
4.Then will automate to inatall update
5.backup your data before update , prevent data lost

LeoROM some feature only suitable for 

 🇨🇳 China 
 🇭🇰 HongKong China
 🇲🇴 Macao China and Taiwan China 

 If you not using above lanaguage some feature will not be support

Select to restore old leotweak setting.

current will be reset.

Don't wipe it if you not sure this!!!

 LeoTweaks will reopen after all process , time needed base on your selection.

 Click『Enter』to continue to restore 
 click『Cancle』to stop this process
Can not find any backup in your device

Be careful when you setting DPI:

allow DPI range is 330-480

Make sure you are in 1080p 

 please do not set DPI when you on 2k resolution.

 1080P default DPI is『420』

DPI value bigger will showing bigger
set background color as the same
example : Do your best , forget the rest
select one icon what you like
after all done press update ,Setting parameters will be update

Google service is disabled by default 
1. To use Google Services, click Install Google Services to restore the disabled Google service
2. If Google Services FC appears, click on Settings to find the application, and find the Google service, manually open all Google service permissions
3. If you need to use Google services in the future, you can personalize - system fine-tuning - enable Google services
4. Of course you can also freeze Google services after enabling Google services (donated version features)
recovering google services, will reboot later
